sellerCard.oneLiner: Crafting beautifully designed WordPress websites for over 18 years
sellerCard.description: OrionWP is a leading web design studio specializing in WordPress development. With over 18 years of experience, we have helped businesses of all sizes improve their online presence and succeed on the web. Our team has delivered over 1000+ websites across 55 countries worldwide, making us one of the most experienced and globally-renowned WordPress design studios in the world.

description.content:
OrionWP is a leading web design studio specializing in WordPress development. With over 18 years of experience, we've helped businesses of all sizes enhance their online presence and thrive. Our team has delivered more than 1,000 websites across 50+ countries, making us one of the most experienced and globally renowned WordPress design studios.


What is included:


  • WordPress custom website design
  • Premium plugins installation and Setup
  • Convert existing website to Elementor
  • Build a WordPress website from PSD, XD, Figma or Zepline...
  • Redesign your existing design
  • SEO friendly
  • I guarantee fast-loading


What's the process?


  1. Please contact me to discuss your project in detail and make sure we're the right team for you. This will also give me the opportunity to learn more about your expectations and preferences, so I can tailor the design to meet your needs.
  2. Send me the content for your website.
  3. After reviewing the content and ensuring it meets the standards, it's time to make things official! I'll send you a custom offer or recommend the best package for your project, and we can get started.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do we start working together?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please send a message before placing an order. So we can agree on the details and to see which plan is the most suitable for you. Everyone's project has different needs, a brief conversation is highly recommended before you order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need from you?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I need all content ready before we start with couple examples of websites that you like just to see in what direction would we go. If you don't have content we can built website with dummy content, and you can later replace it.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
I need your self hosted WordPress admin username and password.
All content ready before we start.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I edit content by my self?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. WordPress and Elementor are very user friendly, it is easy to edit content and make any changes you may need.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I don't have any content ready at the moment for my website what now?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I will use dummy content and you can change it easily after your content is ready or you can make a new order just for content uploading.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer website hosting or domain registration?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I can help with domain registration, web hosting, and anything else regarding your website. Contact me for more information about this.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer support or maintenance after my web site is launched?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes. I offer on going support through messages (Q&A style) to help them manage your website. I can also offer custom maintenance packages to keep your website up to date and secure.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do I need to buy Elementor Pro?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No I have UNLIMITED licence and I'm covering you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if my hosting provider is blocking plugin or theme installation?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We are going to build a website on our local server and provide you final files that you can upload to your website after you fix this issues. You will be able to see what we are doing online and see your new design on our server.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What if I have some technical difficulties and can't provide login details at the time?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: We can wait for up to 12 hours before we start working. After that we will proceed to build a website on our local server and provide you final files, you can upload to your website after you fix this issues. You will be able to see what we are doing online and see your new design on our server.

packageList.title: 1 page
packageList.description: up to 10 section per page, responsive Elementor website. Installing theme plugins.

reviews.comment: Amazing work! I will be purchasing from him again in the future.
Exceptional quality of work and communication skills. I would give him 10 stars if i could. HIGHLY RECOMMEND this seller.
Great! I work with him often.
Genius level. understand what i want intuitively. and he is real patient in guiding me as well
exceptional and excellent service. Will come back for sure! Thank you so much!

notableClients.name: Advisera
notableClients.interaction_description: Advisera was founded in 2009 and has quickly become a market leader in providing documentation and online support for EU GDPR, ISO 27001, ISO 22301, ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 45001, AS9100, ISO 13485, EU MDR, IATF 16949, ISO 17025, ISO 20000 and ITIL.

enriched_details.name: Advisera
enriched_details.description: We are the leading provider of compliance software, toolkits, courses, and services for small businesses. We cover 13 major standards globally and can help you obtain and maintain a certification – whether you are a beginner or an expert.

certifications.certificationName: Certificate of Proficiency as an Elementor Pro Expert
